titles.title: "Natsumi, Kazoku wa Yappari Kizuna no Homerun Ou ne" by Chizuru " Zenzen Wakannai yo, Chizune (Namida)" by Natsumi
Natsumi, Family Will Always Be the Home Run King of Bonds. Don`t You Agree? I Don`t Understand What You Mean at All, Chizuru.
Natsumi, la famille est vraiment la reine du home run affectif. Je comprends rien, grande soeur Chizu.
「夏美, 家族はやっぱり絆のホームラン王ね」by千鶴 「全然わかんないよ, ちづ姉(涙)」by夏美
